Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small Qualgebra AllSmallQualgebra is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic Qualgebra of orders 2 to 4.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallQualgebra">
The output qualgebra are represented by its operation table for +, *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small Qualgebra
"IsASmallQualgebra" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic Qualgebra of orders 2 to 4. It returns true if the model is a Small Qualgebra, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallQualgebra">
